item.title: ██ ExRendum...PERFECT BOUNTY HUNTER + PERFECT DCLAWS + FIXED DBOW ██
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

da boss 911, you can set it at your death method so it get’s player equipment ID’s and then adds them again to the player’s inventory. or you can just set it so they don’t even unequip. for items in the inventory, i can’t really explain it but you can search around client.java for the item dropping methods. and umm

watch the dbow video? when you dbow you can use arows to inf spec. if that’s fixed then i don’t know what the bad one used to be like.

Read full topic
